A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some fans forget that Star Wars is about the Skywalker family. Not just Luke. Spoiler warning here but the movie ends with Skywaker relatives in very intetesting positions. Second of all as the 2nd act it  is a darker low for the good guys. They saw failure after failure through the whole movie with worst results each time. It is comparable to ep 5 (as it should be).
